title: The Greek Billionaire's Secret Baby
description: It’s a baby secret she must keep...Lauren Andrews has always dreamed of marrying Greek billionaire Alex Pappas. She’s loved him from the moment they first met, but their passionate relationship fell apart after Alex believed Lauren to be unfaithful. Now, believing she’s pregnant with his deceased brother’s child, Alex proposes a marriage of convenience. He will do the right thing for the baby. Despite still loving Alex, Lauren knows she must keep her unborn son away from the high-stakes world of Pappas Foods. No longer can she trust Alex to protect her, for she knows he will never believe the truth that the baby she carries is his. But as the nights heat up and Alex proves to be a perfect father, part of her longs to be in Alex’s arms forever. And maybe the secret won’t matter...
author: Michele Dunaway
